entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 1:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: SSE 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
